name: Dodge the Snowballs
description:
Dodge the Snowballs is a simple augmented reality game that you can play by tilting your head left and right. So set your device down, take a step back, and see just how many snowballs you can dodge. This fun and casual game is free from ads, tracking, in-app purchases and other monetization. Have fun!

This game is only available for ARKit enabled iOS devices from 2019 onwards.

Get it on the App Store free: https://apps.apple.com/app/dodge-the-snowballs/id6447530253
